On this showThe Claw  Growl interviews Meredith Marseille the SGCBBC comptroller on the SGAs budgeting process their budget deliberations and how funds are allocated PERIOD The Claw  Growl also discusses President Donald Trumps claim that former President Barack Obama wiretapped Trump Tower during the presidential campaign and compare Trumps new executive travel order with his original travel ban PERIOD
